title: ALS Mini Cabinet Scraper Set of 4 with Instructions - For Woodwork & Guitar Making - Scrapers Made in Sheffield England - Instructions by Australian Luthier Supplies

description: Mini Cabinet Scraper Set by Australian Luthier Supplies, includes- 1 x Square profile mini scraper 1 x Gooseneck/French curve profile mini scraper 1 x Oval profile mini scraper 1 x Concave/convex profile mini scraper 1 x Storage Pouch 1 x Instructions for use by Australian Luthier Supplies  Cabinet scrapers are one of the most commonly used tools by woodworkers, furniture and instrument makers. They can be for many common jobs including-  - Levelling inlays - Bevelling edges - Smoothing timber surfaces - Carving arch tops - Levelling bindings & trim - Removing lacquer - Burnishing surfaces before finishing
